page.title: 09GOVERNMENT IN BERROW AREA
page.content:
{WORCESTERSHIRE}(part of area) Parliamentary Division: South Worcs. County Council: Worcestershire. District Council: Malvern Hills. Parish Councils: Birtsmorton and Berrow.
{GLOUCESTERSHIRE}(part of area) Parliamentary Division: West Gloucester County Council: Gloucestershire. District Council: Forest of Dean. Parish Council: Redmarley.
The particular concerns of the parish councils in the area are such matters as planning applications, drainage, and the control of straying animals.
